1 ^ Nisi qŭia Dòminus èrat in nobîs: 2 ^ nisi qŭia Dòminus èrat in nobîs
^ If it had not been that the Lord was: ^ if it had not been that the Lord was with us
let Israel now say: when men rose up against us

dícat nunc Isráhel: qŭum irascerétur furor eórum in nos~; ^ perhaps they had swallowed us up alive
^ If it had not been that the Lord was: when their fury was enkindled against us~;

1 ^ Nisi qŭia Dòminus èrat in nobîs: 4 ^ fórsitan aqŭa absorbuìsset nos~; torrèntem pertransívit ánima nostra~; ^ perhaps the water had swallowed us up~; our soul hath passed through a torrent~;
5 ^ fórsitan pertransivìsset ánima nostra aqŭam intolerábilem. ^ perhaps our soul had passed through a water insupportable.

^ If it had not been that the Lord was: in captiónem dèntibus eórum. ^ Blessed be the Lord
let Israel now say: who hath not given us to be a prey to their teeth.

1 ^ Nisi qŭia Dòminus èrat in nobîs: 7 ^ Ánima nostra sicut passer erèpta èst de láqŭeo venántium~; láqueus contrítus èst
dícat nunc Isráhel: et nos liberáti sùmus. ^ Our soul like a sparrow hath been delivered from the snare of the hunters~; the snare is broken
qŭi fecit caĕlum et terram. ^ Our help is in the name of the Lord
